tool_description: An API designed for text translation between different languages.

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: This API function allows users to translate text from one language to another.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: The text that needs to be translated.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: The target language code for translation.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The source language code of the text.
